title: Powerful insightful and brutal
review:
An insight into the brutal world of Boko Haram and it's idealogic vilification of western civilization.
This documentary, with insights from many prominent players shows the shocking violence and murder in the name of religion. 
It is a fascinating and terrifying look at what happens when corruption, greed and religious fanaticism reach hit each other head on.
Warning, this documentary contains many uncut scenes of extreme violence, it's not for everyone...
